stories.name: Dr. Rajesh Seervi
stories.journey: Started from a small village in Gujarat, completed MBBS through hard work and determination. Now serving as a doctor in Vadodara.
stories.message: Education is the key to success. Never give up on your dreams, no matter how difficult the path seems.

stories.name: Priya Seervi
stories.journey: Cleared JEE and got admission in IIT. Worked hard during college and now working as a Software Engineer in a top tech company.
stories.message: Hard work and consistency always pay off. Believe in yourself and keep moving forward.

stories.name: Amit Seervi
stories.journey: Cleared UPSC after 3 attempts. Never lost hope and kept studying. Now serving as an IAS officer.
stories.message: Failure is not the end, it's just a stepping stone. Keep trying and you will succeed.

stories.name: Kavita Seervi
stories.journey: Started a small business after graduation. Faced many challenges but never gave up. Now running a successful business.
stories.message: Entrepreneurship requires courage and persistence. Start small, dream big, and work hard.

stories.name: Rahul Seervi
stories.journey: Became a teacher after completing B.Ed. Now teaching in a reputed school and helping students achieve their dreams.
stories.message: Teaching is a noble profession. If you have the passion to help others, teaching is the best career.
